body:
Hiyo,

Just a small little update post that me and Klaypex updated control the hill kits a bit. Not much to show other than kits (as maps remain untouched), but the change-log is worth posting.
body_tagged:
Hiyo,

Just a small little update post that me and Klaypex updated control the hill kits a bit. Not much to show other than kits (as maps remain untouched), but the change-log is worth posting.
title: Control the Hill Update 7/13/15

  • Slowness 4 > Slowness 2 [tanker]
